name: sedulity
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality or fact of being careful and using a lot of effort: Our safety depended on our sedulity. They apply themselves with great sedulity to the care of their patients.
More examplesFewer examplesI don't understand why so many unnecessary things are taught with such sedulity.His sedulity and care have allowed our countries to make this alliance.For the plan to succeed, the utmost sedulity is required.His sedulity led him to endanger his safety in order to check that the work was done properly.
